metadata.title: Generated Gibs for Darkest Desire 4.0.2
metadata.author: Aleev
metadata.description:
Provides Gibs (debris pieces that are shown whenever ships are destroyed) for Darkest Desire by Naimeron
This addon has to be patched after Darkest Desire itself
Gibs were generated with the G.L.A.I.V.E. tool made by Epirasque
